doc.title: Opera Omnibus
doc.plot: Eight segments of opera films: Sheng Xinma performs a monologue from _A King's Revenge (1955), followed by an excerpt of _The Patriot's Sword_ (1958). Cibo Liang is featured in _An Immortal Refuses Love_ (1958), and Yutang Bai appears in _The Wonder Boy_ (1961). Segment five shows Xingbo Liang, Jiasheng Lin, and Cibo Liang in _The Impartial Bao Gong_ (1967), while segment six is a performance by Northern opera actress Suqiu Yu. The last two are versions of _Red Maid, The Matchmaker_, first a 1958 film with Yanfen Fang and An Banri, followed by one titled _The Little Go-Between_, featuring Baobao Feng and Cibo Liang. It was originally double billed with _South China Stars Special_.
